projects.title: nextJSCrud
projects.description: nextJSCrud is a simple todo app built using NodeJS, NextJS, Expres and MongoDB stack. Its a very simple project that I was using to re-learn/ touch up on my skills with full-stack development

projects.title: ZRP
projects.description: ZRP is a fivem script. It is not fully complete, but has many advanced features and uses a custom made OOP system. Its built using LUA, Typescript and React. It has some nice custom features, but has an issue with its event system.

projects.title: FastDB
projects.description: FastDB is a WIP MongoDB explorer and editor, built using electron-forge. My goal was to create a very simple, and easy to use and look at MongoDB editor.

projects.title: ZiiMForge
projects.description: ZiiMForge is a WIP CurseForge clone, builting using nextron. My goal was to recreate it with a little ibt of a different UI.

projects.title: ZiiM-Hud
projects.description: ZiiM-Hud is a mod for minecraft built for Fabric modloader. It adds a hud to your screen that allows you to track useful information right on your screen. One of the most challenging projects i've done.

projects.title: React FiveM Boilerplate
projects.description: React FiveM Boilerplate was a way to easily use React with FiveM. I combined three other similar projects from other creators into one. Allowing for a nice and simple way of using React.

projects.title: ChatChannel
projects.description: ChatChannel was a spigot plugin with the goal of being a simple channel based chat. You would be able to add channels, and set who has permissions to join said channel. Then a person can just join the channel and talk with only people in that channel.

projects.title: ZiiM Crates
projects.description: ZiiM Crates is a simple unboxing spigot plugin. Its very simple, it allows you to set the rewards and odds with a nice and simple UI.

projects.title: Other Spigot
projects.description: Uncomplete Spigot is a collection of small spigot plugins I made. Most of them are rough around the edges. Most of these are what I used to learn Java.

projects.title: ZiiM-Queue
projects.description: ZiiM-Queue was a spigot plugin I released. Its goal was to be a queueing based system in spigot.

projects.title: Cops & Robbers
projects.description: Cops & Robbers was an unfinished Cops & Robbers gamemode for FiveM. My goal was to make a simple gamemode using all the knowledge I got from TriumphRP. However I lost interest in it shortly after.

projects.title: Triumph RP
projects.description: Triumph RP is the very first FiveM server I made. It never was finished but it was first time learning lua.

projects.title: SAMP DayZ
projects.description: SAMP Dayz or gtaDayz was a gamemode I made for SAMP. My goal was to recreate the dayz mod in SAMP, using PAWN.

projects.title: Elobuddy
projects.description: This is one of my very first scripts I ever made. It was bot script for League of Legends. I made it for a class in highschool.
